group_1.textLeft: H-huh...? Now that I think about it...
Wait! I can't be the culprit!

group_1.textRight: You still refuse to admit it...?!

group_1.textLeft: When you said I might be the culprit...

group_1.narration: "The criminal always returns to the scene of@the crime, and since you're on the committee,@it'd be easy for you to get info and cause trouble."

group_1.textLeft: That's what you said, right?

group_1.textRight: That's right!

group_1.textLeft: Those words...also apply to you, don't they?

group_1.textRight: [chara:101301:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!
I-indeed, you're absolutely correct...!

group_1.textLeft: That's right, doubting each other isâ€”

group_1.textRight: I'M the culprit?!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:302401:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]WHAT?! Are you?!

group_1.textRight: I have no memory of any of this, but@considering the circumstances...

group_1.textCenter: Err...what's all the commotion so late at night...?

group_1.textLeft: Yukika-senpai...! Why are you here...?

group_1.textRight: I felt I should do a little investigating, since@there's been so much trouble...
The patrolling teacher will be leaving in@a little while.

group_1.textLeft: How do you know that?

group_1.textRight: ...It's a long story, so I won't bore you with the@details, but I've been through various things...

group_1.textLeft: ...You know so much...?
Don't tell me, YOU'RE the culprit...?!

group_1.textRight: .........I beg your pardon?
...Have you calmed down?

group_1.textLeft: ...There's no way we're the culprits, okay?

group_1.textRight: My deepest apologies for suspecting you...

group_1.textLeft: As long as you understand, that's fine!
More importantly, let's work together to find@the culprit!

group_1.textRight: I also believe we should identify the culprit@before tomorrow's preparations...

group_1.textLeft: We'll be in trouble if we don't finish in time!

group_1.textRight: There's that, of course, but...
We'll construct the stalls and stage tomorrow,@so if there's any trouble...
I'm afraid the danger may be much greater@than today's...

group_1.textLeft: [chara:302401:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]You mean there might be a serious accident?!

group_1.textRight: That would be terrible!
Shouldn't we get the help of others, so we can@catch the culprit as soon as possible?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, let's go call some other Magical Girls!
I want to talk about the seeds, too.

group_1.textRight: The seeds?

group_1.textLeft: I'll tell you more when we're all together!

group_1.textRight: We're a bit conspicuous here, so let's move@to a new location first.

group_1.textLeft: We'll also need to figure out a way to get into@the school.

group_1.textRight: In that case, you can leave it to me,@I have a way to sneak in.
